entry.title: Blinded 2-party Musig2
entry.summary: The author suggests that every time a public key is transmitted, it should be accompanied by a "proof of secret key" to prevent potential vulnerabilities. The author proposes that this measure should be integrated into low-level protocols. An alternative discussion regarding this topic can be found at the following link: https://gist.github.com/RubenSomsen/be7a4760dd4596d06963d67baf140406
